DFA_Toolkit.String¶

class DFA_Toolkit.String¶

Represents either a positive or a negative string of a given DFA.

__init__(*args, **kwargs)¶

Overloaded function.

Attributes

accepting

String is an accepting string if value true and vica versa for false.

length

String’s length.

String’s value.
